page.title: 08A Day in the Life of Fiona
page.content: {A Day in the Life of Fiona Emmins,Age {9 years {______________________________________ I woke at 08.00 hrs and went into the bathroom and washed, dressed and went down stairs. At 08.30 Rachel, my friend, arrived and we went outside and played "IT". At 08.45 we went indoors, put our coats on and picked up our bags, got into the car and Mum drove us to school. As we arrived my sister, Caroline, bumped her nose on the seat of the car and started crying. We walked into school and hung up our bags and coats and went into the school yard to line up,then walked back into school where I picked up my bag and went into class where I wrote my daily diary. We then watched a TV programme,"Science Workshop".At break, several of us had to go home to get our Wellington boots because we were
